items.sentence: The last time I saw Tom, he was still married to Mary.
Did you know that you weren't going to pass the class?
Tom is the owner of a newspaper, a factory and a ship.
I heard that Tom partied a little too hard last night.
I had a feeling that something dreadful was happening.
I can't stay in Boston. I have to get back to Chicago.
Happiness is something you can give without having it.
It isn't easy to part with one's favorite possessions.
Is this the first time that you've applied for a loan?
We have to appoint new members of the examining board.
